section.p: If you have a chameleon cloak, immediately. If not, read on.

You hear an ominous rustling in the branches overhead. Looking up, you spot a pair of bulbous eyes swivelling round towards you. It is a giant chameleon - a creature at least twelve feet long - its skin as green and mottled as the forest itself.
It spits out its long, thick tongue, trying to suck you into its massive jaws. You dodge aside, but trip on some brambles and fall on to a pile of rotting gurul fruit.
